Title: GeoServer vulnerable to SSRF in TestWfsPost for specific targets, e.g. PHP + Nginx
Description: Missing checks allow for SSRF to specific targets using the TestWfsPost enpoint.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.0.0 before 2.24.4, all versions starting from 2.25.0 before 2.25.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.0, all versions starting from 2.24.4 before 2.25.0, all versions starting from 2.25.2
